attributes.additional_details: This is an important matter that impacts public security, and the security of our kids, and the people need to know the truth about what happened
attributes.background: National Grooming Gangs inquiry is an important issue that worry the UK population and represents a risk for the public safe

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
